name: Night Rogue
description:
Play as Thomas, a young but skilled thief in the dark medieval city of Riverport. Enter a world filled with shadows, corruption, fanatical religions, subterfuge, and mystery.

Features:

  • Infiltrate mansions, castles, museums, colleges, cathedrals, ancient ruins, and many more locations in 11 full length missions
  • Use yours wits to avoid guard patrols and evade detection
  • Eavesdrop on conversations to discover critical information
  • Explore the levels to discover hidden loot & lore
  • A full original soundtrack
